title: PartyLite Gift Set of 12 Universal Tea Lights, Sea Salt & Sage Scented, Notes of Salted Air, Sea-Soaked Sage, Driftwood, Coconut & Sandalwood, 4-6 Hour Burn Time, Luxurious & Rich, Perfect for Gifting
features: LUXURIOUS AROMATHERAPY: Indulge in the rich, highly fragranced blend of ocean-washed sage, bleached driftwood, and coastal sea salt with this elegant gift set of 12 PartyLite Universal Tealight Candles. Crafted with a non-toxic paraffin and soy wax blend.

LONG-LASTING: Enjoy up to 4-6 hours of burn time. Made with a high-quality soy wax blend and three 100% natural and lead-free wicks, it provides an even, consistent fragrance experience that enhances any room in your home.

HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Each tealight features a premium soy wax blend for exceptional scent throw and burn time. The wax is safe and natural, aligned with the BePure Commitment, ensuring a clean burn every time.

EXPERTLY CRAFTED BLENDS: Infuse your space with a robust, long-lasting fragrance. Top notes: Bergamot, Orange, Chamomile, Green Notes. Middle notes: Coconut, Sage, Sea Salt Accord. Bottom notes: Cedarwood, Driftwood, Sandalwood.

EARTH-FRIENDLY: Our commitment to sustainability reduces environmental impact. We prioritize renewable resources, plant-derived ingredients & recycled materials. Our products are cruelty-free, never contain animal products and are never tested on animals.

PURITY PROMISE: Our BePURE Commitment ensures clean-burning candles made with natural essential oils and 100% natural wicks, free from lead. Our No No List guarantees fragrances free from harmful ingredients like parabens, phthalates, sulfates and dyes.

PERFECT GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION: A luxurious gift for women and men alike, ideal for birthdays, housewarmings, or special occasions. Thoughtfully designed and beautifully packaged, it's a sophisticated present for any candle lover.
description: Choose better quality scented tealights that fully liquefy for the best fragrance throw, plus the cleanest burning wax. This 12-pack of Sea Salt & Sage fragranced candles features the freshness of blue sage and citrus mingled with beachy coconut and sea salt, plus restful woody notes of tranquility.
